TextBlock.Text: CASSAVA: Transport of all available gravity crystals from the <color=orange>Gravity Crystal Workshop</color> is now complete.
CASSAVA: My gratitude for all your hard work, Kousa.. With this, assembly of the <color=orange>Inspired project</color> can finally begin.

CASSAVA: The storms could sweep away the scroll containing the Inspired's schematics if I am careless.. Perhaps it would be safer keep this scroll safely within the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station.</color>
